partner.title: Agency Governance & Operations Agreement
partner.subtitle: Unified Commitment Charter for Zora Agents (v2.1)
partner.intro: This agreement constitutes the binding legal framework between the Zora platform (First Party) and the travel agent (Second Party):

articles.title: Article (1): Nature of Relationship & Agency
articles.desc: The relationship between the parties is that of an independent technical agency, where the Second Party acts as an authorized agent to provide services via the platform.

articles.title: Article (2): Accuracy of Financial Offers
articles.desc: The agent commits that prices provided in offers are final and inclusive of all declared taxes and fees.

articles.title: Article (3): International Quality Standards
articles.desc: The agent acknowledges providing services that comply with the standards of the American Society of Travel Advisors (ASTA) and the International Air Transport Association (IATA).

articles.title: Article (4): Price Stability
articles.desc: Changing the offer price after client acceptance is prohibited, except in officially proven cases of force majeure.

articles.title: Article (5): Rapid Response Policy
articles.desc: The agent commits to responding to client inquiries and modification requests within a period not exceeding 4 business hours.

articles.title: Article (6): Prohibition of Financial Circumvention
articles.desc: Communicating with travelers outside the official platform channels to bypass system commissions is strictly forbidden. Proven violation will result in immediate suspension of the agent.

articles.title: Article (7): Traveler Data Protection
articles.desc: The agent is committed to maintaining the confidentiality of traveler data and not using it for any marketing purposes outside the scope of the current request.

articles.title: Article (8): Digital Content Ownership
articles.desc: All images, plans, and data generated via the platform are the intellectual property of Zora, and the agent is not permitted to reuse them.

articles.title: Article (9): Platform Commissions & Collection
articles.desc: The platform is entitled to a fixed commission, which is deducted from the total value before transferring the net dues to the agent's account.

articles.title: Article (10): Cancellation & Refund Policy
articles.desc: The agent must clearly state the cancellation policy in every offer and adhere to refunding amounts according to that policy.

articles.title: Article (11): Legal Liability
articles.desc: The agent bears full legal responsibility for the quality of field service execution and any compensation resulting from implementation failures.

articles.title: Article (12): Insurance Coverage
articles.desc: It is preferred that the agent holds professional liability insurance to cover any operational risks during travelers' trips.

articles.title: Article (13): Platform Updates
articles.desc: Zora reserves the right to update the platform's interfaces and tools as it deems appropriate to improve the experience, with notification to the agent of substantial changes.

articles.title: Article (14): Dispute Resolution
articles.desc: In case of a dispute between the agent and the traveler, Zora acts as a primary technical mediator. If reconciliation is not possible, the matter is referred to the competent judiciary.

articles.title: Article (15): Confidentiality of Business Operations
articles.desc: The agent commits not to disclose the working mechanism of the Zora smart radar or any strategic technologies reviewed during the agency.

articles.title: Article (16): Digital Signature & Reliability
articles.desc: The agent acknowledges that clicking the 'Agree' button constitutes a legally binding electronic signature according to the Electronic Transactions Law.

partner.acceptCheckbox: I agree to all 16 articles of the Agency Governance & Digital Operations Agreement
partner.button: Digitally Sign Agreement & Activate Agent Portal
partner.footer: This agreement is protected and documented by Zora's digital ledger.

client.title: Traveler Terms of Use & Services
client.subtitle: Traveler Rights Protection Charter (v2.1)
client.intro: By using the Zora platform, you acknowledge your full and unconditional acceptance of the following terms:

articles.title: First: Nature of Service
articles.desc: Zora is a technical orchestration platform. All final travel services are provided and executed by licensed, independent travel agents.

articles.title: Second: Finality of Decision
articles.desc: Once you select an offer and pay its value, your decision is final and binding. Funds are transferred to the agent according to platform policies.

articles.title: Third: Buyer Protection
articles.desc: Zora holds paid amounts in an Escrow account, and funds are not released to the agent until the trip's commencement is confirmed to protect your rights.

articles.title: Fourth: Limitation of Liability
articles.desc: Zora's liability is limited to technical coordination and securing financial rights. The quality of on-the-ground service execution is the responsibility of the chosen agent.

articles.title: Fifth: Privacy Policy
articles.desc: We are committed to protecting your personal data and sharing it only with agents competing for your request, in accordance with the Saudi Personal Data Protection Law.

articles.title: Sixth: Data Storage & Digital Governance Policy
articles.desc: You agree that legally binding data (such as your approvals and final prices) are stored in a secure central ledger with the platform to serve as a statutory reference in case of any dispute, while your daily operational data remains stored locally on your device to ensure privacy.

client.acceptCheckbox: I agree to the terms of service and the approved traveler protection charter
